= Details =
To change the header, meta tags, site keywords:

   1. Go to example.com/data
   2. Edit the file header.inc.php
   3. Edit the following lines:

<code>
      <TITLE><?php echo $title?> @BookintheBible</TITLE>
      <meta name="author" content="Jason Jersey / Qorporate LLC">
      <meta name="copyright" content="2010 Qorporate LLC">
      <meta name="email" content="op@qorporate.com">
      <meta name="Rating" content="General">
      <meta name="Distribution" content="Global">
      <meta name="Robots" content="INDEX,FOLLOW">
</code>
 

To change the footer, includes bottom links:

   1. Go to example.com/data
   2. Edit the file footer.inc.php

To apply custom template, all you will need to do is edit the above files.


To change the sites header title:

   1. Go to example.com/data
   2. Edit the file template.inc.php
   3. Edit the following lines:

    $template['searchForm1']['StartHTML']="<h1>Book in the Bible Search</h1>

 

To change chapter title or edit config:

   1. Go to example.com/data
   2. Edit the file config.inc.php

Bible text; includes all verses:

   1. Go to example.com/bibles/kjv.csv
